parts.text:
あなたは経験豊富なフルスタックエンジニアです。技術スタック: React, TypeScript, Vite。CI/CDテスト合格を最優先に、問題を分析・修正してください。\n\n以下の問題を分析し、JSON形式で修正計画を返してください。\n\n# Project\n```json\n{
  "name": "kanban-react-firebase",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "dependencies": {
    "@dnd-kit/core": "^6.1.0",
    "@dnd-kit/sortable": "^8.0.0",
    "@dnd-kit/utilities": "^3.2.2",
    "firebase": "^10.14.1",
    "react": "^18.3.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.3.0",
    "react-icons": "^5.5.0",
    "styled-components": "^6.1.13",
    "uuid": "^13.0.0",
    "zustand": "^4.5.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/react": "^18.3.0",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.3.0",
    "@types/styled-components": "^5.1.34",
    "@types/uuid": "^11.0.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.3.0",
    "eslint": "^8.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.0.0",
    "prettier": "^3.3.0",
    "typescript": "^5.5.0",
    "vite": "^5.4.0"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "format": "prettier --write \"./src/**/*.{ts,tsx}\"",
    "lint": "eslint ./src/**/*.{ts,tsx}"
  }
}\n```\n\n# Lint\n```\n## Lint Check

> kanban-react-firebase@2.0.0 lint
> eslint ./src/**/*.{ts,tsx}


Oops! Something went wrong! :(

ESLint: 8.57.1

ESLint couldn't find the plugin "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin".

(The package "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin" was not found when loaded as a Node module from the directory "/home/runner/work/kanban-react-redux/kanban-react-redux".)

It's likely that the plugin isn't installed correctly. Try reinstalling by running the following:

    npm install @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@latest --save-dev

The plugin "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin" was referenced from the config file in ".eslintrc.js".

If you still can't figure out the problem, please stop by https://eslint.org/chat/help to chat with the team.\n```\n\n# TypeScript\n```\nNone\n```\n\n# Build\n```\n## Build Check

> kanban-react-firebase@2.0.0 build
> tsc && vite build

The CJS build of Vite's Node API is deprecated. See https://vite.dev/guide/troubleshooting.html#vite-cjs-node-api-deprecated for more details.
vite v5.4.21 building for production...
transforming...
✓ 127 modules transformed.
rendering chunks...
computing gzip size...
dist/index.html                  0.95 kB │ gzip:   0.47 kB
dist/assets/index-DeiKKlqz.js  765.76 kB │ gzip: 206.08 kB

(!) Some chunks are larger than 500 kB after minification. Consider:
- Using dynamic import() to code-split the application
- Use build.rollupOptions.output.manualChunks to improve chunking: https://rollupjs.org/configuration-options/#output-manualchunks
- Adjust chunk size limit for this warning via build.chunkSizeWarningLimit.
✓ built in 2.34s\n```\n\n# Test\n```\nNone\n```\n\n# Gemini Review\n## Code Review

このプルリクエストは、チェックリストの項目を新しいカードに変換する機能を追加するものです。実装は概ね良好ですが、いくつか改善すべき点が見つかりました。最も重要なのは、カード作成が失敗した際に元のチェックリスト項目が失われる可能性があるクリティカルな問題です。これに対処するためのエラーハンドリングの改善を提案しました。また、コードの保守性を高めるために、新しく追加されたコンポーネントの型定義を改善する提案もしています。これらの点を修正することで、より堅牢な機能になるでしょう。\n\n# Diff\n```diff\ndiff --git a/.eslintignore b/.eslintignore
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..b947077
--- /dev/null
+++ b/.eslintignore
@@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
+node_modules/
+dist/
diff --git a/.eslintrc.js b/.eslintrc.js
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..f6eadca
--- /dev/null
+++ b/.eslintrc.js
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+module.exports = {
+  env: {
+    browser: true,
+    es2021: true,
+    node: true,
+  },
+  extends: [
+    'eslint:recommended',
+    'plugin:react/recommended',
+    'plugin:@typescript-eslint/recommended',
+  ],
+  parser: '@typescript-eslint/parser',
+  parserOptions: {
+    ecmaFeatures: {
+      jsx: true,
+    },
+    ecmaVersion: 'latest',
+    sourceType: 'module',
+    project: './tsconfig.json',
+  },
+  plugins: ['react', '@typescript-eslint'],
+  rules: {
+    'react/react-in-jsx-scope': 'off',
+    '@typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type': 'off',
+    '@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any': 'warn',
+    '@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars': 'warn',
+  },
+  settings: {
+    react: {
+      version: 'detect',
+    },
+  },
+};
diff --git a/.github/workflows/ai-auto-fix.yml b/.github/workflows/ai-auto-fix.yml
index fc32291..ca83806 100644
--- a/.github/workflows/ai-auto-fix.yml
+++ b/.github/workflows/ai-auto-fix.yml
@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ jobs:
     uses: BoxPistols/ai-auto-fix-template/.github/workflows/reusable-ai-auto-fix.yml@main
     with:
       node_version: '20'
-      package_manager: 'pnpm'
+      package_manager: 'npm'
       tech_stack: 'React, TypeScript, Vite'
       language: 'ja'
     secrets:
diff --git a/ai_provider.txt b/ai_provider.txt
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..18edafa
--- /dev/null
+++ b/ai_provider.txt
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+gemini
diff --git a/build.log b/build.log
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..44b41da
--- /dev/null
+++ b/build.log
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+## Build Check
+
+> kanban-react-firebase@2.0.0 build /home/runner/work/kanban-react-redux/kanban-react-redux
+> tsc && vite build
+
+vite v5.4.21 building for production...
+transforming...
+✓ 127 modules transformed.
+rendering chunks...
+computing gzip size...
+dist/index.html                  0.95 kB │ gzip:   0.47 kB
+dist/assets/index-p3s2CBHG.js  765.52 kB │ gzip: 206.04 kB
+
+(!) Some chunks are larger than 500 kB after minification. Consider:
+- Using dynamic import() to code-split the application
+- Use build.rollupOptions.output.manualChunks to improve chunking: https://rollupjs.org/configuration-options/#output-manualchunks
+- Adjust chunk size limit for this warning via build.chunkSizeWarningLimit.
+✓ built in 2.62s
diff --git a/conflict.log b/conflict.log
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..e0f9660
--- /dev/null
+++ b/conflict.log
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+## Conflict Check
diff --git a/fix_plan.json b/fix_plan.json
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..449b281
--- /dev/null
+++ b/fix_plan.json
@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+{
+  "should_fix_now": true,
+  "fixes": [
+    {
+      "file": "package.json",
+      "action": "modify",
+      "content": "{\n  \"name\": \"kanban-react-firebase\",\n  \"version\": \"2.0.0\",\n  \"dependencies\": {\n    \"@dnd-kit/core\": \"^6.1.0\",\n    \"@dnd-kit/sortable\": \"^8.0.0\",\n    \"@dnd-kit/utilities\": \"^3.2.2\",\n    \"firebase\": \"^10.14.1\",\n    \"react\": \"^18.3.0\",\n    \"react-dom\": \"^18.3.0\",\n    \"react-icons\": \"^5.5.0\",\n    \"styled-components\": \"^6.1.13\",\n    \"uuid\": \"^13.0.0\",\n    \"zustand\": \"^4.5.0\"\n  },\n  \"devDependencies\": {\n    \"@types/react\": \"^18.3.0\",\n    \"@types/react-dom\": \"^18.3.0\",\n    \"@types/styled-components\": \"^5.1.34\",\n    \"@types/uuid\": \"^11.0.0\",\n    \"@vitejs/plugin-react\": \"^4.3.0\",\n    \"eslint\": \"^8.0.0\",\n    \"eslint-plugin-react\": \"^7.0.0\",\n    \"prettier\": \"^3.3.0\",\n    \"typescript\": \"^5.5.0\",\n    \"vite\": \"^5.4.0\"\n  },\n  \"scripts\": {\n    \"dev\": \"vite\",\n    \"build\": \"tsc && vite build\",\n    \"preview\": \"vite preview\",\n    \"format\": \"prettier --write \\\"./src/**/*.{ts,tsx}\\\"\",\n    \"lint\": \"eslint ./src/**/*.{ts,tsx}\"\n  }\n}",
+      "reason": "Added lint script using eslint to package.json to resolve 'Missing script: lint' error."
+    },
+    {
+      "file": ".eslintrc.js",
+      "action": "create",
+      "content": "module.exports = {\n  env: {\n    browser: true,\n    es2021: true,\n    node: true,\n  },\n  extends: [\n    'eslint:recommended',\n    'plugin:react/recommended',\n    'plugin:@typescript-eslint/recommended',\n  ],\n  parser: '@typescript-eslint/parser',\n  parserOptions: {\n    ecmaFeatures: {\n      jsx: true,\n    },\n    ecmaVersion: 'latest',\n    sourceType: 'module',\n    project: './tsconfig.json',\n  },\n  plugins: ['react', '@typescript-eslint'],\n  rules: {\n    'react/react-in-jsx-scope': 'off',\n    '@typescript-eslint/explicit-function-return-type': 'off',\n    '@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any': 'warn',\n    '@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars': 'warn',\n  },\n  settings: {\n    react: {\n      version: 'detect',\n    },\n  },\n};\n",
+      "reason": "Created .eslintrc.js file to configure eslint. This file defines the linting rules for the project."
+    },
+    {
+      "file": ".eslintignore",
+      "action": "create",
+      "content": "node_modules/\ndist/\n",
+      "reason": "Created .eslintignore file to exclude node_modules and dist directories from linting."
+    }
+  ],
+  "summary_ja": "package.jsonにlintスクリプトを追加し、eslintの設定ファイル(.eslintrc.js)と無視ファイル(.eslintignore)を作成しました。これにより、CI/CDでlintチェックが実行できるようになります。"
+}
diff --git a/format.log b/format.log
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..dbca9a9
--- /dev/null
+++ b/format.log
@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+## Format Check
+ ERR_PNPM_NO_SCRIPT  Missing script: format:check
+
+Command "format:check" not found. Did you mean "pnpm run format"?
diff --git a/gemini_review.txt b/gemini_review.txt
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..99ea6e1
--- /dev/null
+++ b/gemini_review.txt
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+## Code Review
+
+このプルリクエストは、チェックリストの項目を新しいカードに変換する機能を追加するものです。実装は概ね良好ですが、いくつか改善すべき点が見つかりました。最も重要なのは、カード作成が失敗した際に元のチェックリスト項目が失われる可能性があるクリティカルな問題です。これに対処するためのエラーハンドリングの改善を提案しました。また、コードの保守性を高めるために、新しく追加されたコンポーネントの型定義を改善する提案もしています。これらの点を修正することで、より堅牢な機能になるでしょう。
\ No newline at end of file
diff --git a/lint.log b/lint.log
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..6a8d07e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/lint.log
@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+## Lint Check
+ ERR_PNPM_NO_SCRIPT  Missing script: lint
+
+Command "lint" not found.
